function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Remote operation and monitoring may lead to increased risk of contagion spread if proper health and safety measures are not implemented","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential outbreaks in remote areas","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict health and safety protocols for on-site personnel, regular disinfection of equipment, and use of personal protective equipment","Technologies":"6G technology for remote monitoring and robotics for remote operation","People":"On-site personnel, residents of remote areas","Owner":"Engineering and operating companies"},{"Description":"Proximity to fragile or toxic ores and chemicals can pose health risks in the absence of proper monitoring and control","Impact":"Exposure to toxic substances and increased risk of illness or injury","Mitigation":"Use of advanced sensors for real-time monitoring, implementation of automated safety protocols, and remote operation and surveillance using 6G technology","Technologies":"Advanced sensors for real-time monitoring, automated safety systems, 6G technology for remote operation and surveillance","People":"Workers in mining and industrial facilities","Owner":"Mining and industrial companies"},{"Description":"Increased urban density and the use of digital replicas in smart cities may impact public health and safety","Impact":"Potential overcrowding, inadequate infrastructure, and increased risk of disease transmission in densely populated urban areas","Mitigation":"Urban planning for sustainable and healthy city design, implementation of advanced healthcare infrastructure, and strict monitoring of public health indicators","Technologies":"Digital twin technology for urban planning, 6G technology for advanced connectivity and data transfer","People":"Urban residents, city planners, public health officials","Owner":"City planning authorities"}]}
